content: i really wanted to give a nod in this crochet pattern to the reality of smallholding life with an adorable but ever so scruffy amigurumi sheep you will need 2 5oz lily sugar n cream worsted weight cotton yarn in ecru off white 2 5oz lily sugar n cream worsted weight cotton yarn in jute pale brown 4mm crochet hook safety eyes toy safe stuffing find the full pattern for free on the lucy kate crochet website
